name: Avoid functions that are too long (Flex)
description: This QR reports functions\getters\setters with more than 20 lines.
output:
This QR reports functions\getters\setters with more than 20 lines. It provides following information:

- function\getter\settter full name
rationale: Violations of this rule usually indicate that the method has too much responsibility. Try to reduce the method size by creating helper methods and removing any copy/pasted code.
remediation: Refactor function\getter\setter to have less than 20 lines of code.
